Posts.Content: ok it seems i have some of the symptoms of prostrate problems go figure being 65 i guess it is about time. anyway i have most of the symptoms pee often slow to start takes forever etc. my bph is 4.5 and the doctor i have been seeing says that is normal for my age. one day he wants do surgery then the next visit 6 months later he says no more tests. now he has retired so i have to find another doctor. my big question i guess is this i'm positive i need to get reamed out but what procedure is better laser or the gold standard turp? and what one can better tell if there is cancer present? with turp they get tissue but with laser seems to me there will be not as that procedure melts all tissue correct? i have both procedures around my town now to pick. any help here? thanks bob
Posts.Title: i have a question about prostrate issues
